newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Storm Technology cut.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Storm Technology cut.

text.p: -- Hambrecht & Quist said its analyst Todd Bakar cut his earnings estimates and stock rating for Storm Technology to hold after Storm said Q4 earnings would be below expectations due to lower-than-forecast sales.
-- Bakar cut his rating to hold from buy.
-- He reduced his fourth quarter estimate to a loss of $0.11 a share on revenues of $8.0 million from a loss of $0.04 on sales of $10.8 million.
-- Bakar also cut his 1997 estimate to a profit of $0.10 a share on sales of $49 million from a profit of $0.38 a share on sales of $60 million.
-- Shares were trading down four at 5-1/2 in midmorning exchange trade.
